Module 3: Testing

Intro Videos Quiz

Module 3 Videos


Watch the following two videos for some examples of clients who are given tests.


Video 1: Testing



Video 2: Testing



If you observed an impairment like those presented in the videos, then you would complete DOR Form 153, Possible Driver Impairment(s) Notification and forward to the Central Office of the Driver License Bureau for processing. When completing the form, think in terms of the 3 major skills required for driving: vision, motor skills, and memory and thinking skills.
